headline: WATCH: AZ Gubernatorial Candidate Kari Lake Reacts to 60 Minutes Australia’s Extremely Biased Interview: “This Guy Came Into It With a Raging Case Of Stage 4 Trump Derangement Syndrome”
author: Jordan Conradson
